name: Playa Grande
description: The most famous beach in Mar del Plata, ideal for walking, surfing, and enjoying the sunrise.

name: Museo Marítimo
description: A journey through Argentina's naval history with historic vessels and interactive exhibits.

name: Paseo Diamante
description: A coastal promenade with gardens, fountains, and sculptures. Ideal for families and sunrise strolls.

name: El Faro
description: A historic lighthouse with panoramic ocean views. Ideal for photos and leisurely strolls.

name: Teatro Auditorium
description: One of the most important theaters in South America. Concerts, operas, and internationally acclaimed shows.

name: Parque San Martín
description: The city's green lung. Ideal for walks, sports, and family picnics.

name: La Rambla
description: An area of ​​bars, restaurants, and nightlife. The heart of summer entertainment.

name: Museo de la Ciudad
description: An exhibition on the history, architecture, and evolution of Mar del Plata since 1870
